entry.content:
This summer I had the pleasure of performing at a truly magical wedding at ChÃ¢teau de Caumont, a beautiful 16th-century castle located in the heart of southern France (Cazaux-SavÃ¨s, Gers).

The celebration took place on a warm July evening, bathed in golden light and surrounded by gardens, history and pure elegance. The atmosphere couldnâ€™t have been more perfect for music and joy.

For the aperitif, I performed my Ibiza-style DJ&SAX live set, blending chill house, pop and Balearic vibes while walking among the guests with my saxophone. The music created a relaxed and elegant mood as people sipped champagne and admired the sunset over the chÃ¢teau.


Later, as the night came alive, I joined the DJ on the dancefloor, playing live saxophone over a selection of disco anthems, electronic hits and timeless classics. From Earth, Wind & Fire to David Guetta, we kept everyone dancing with perfect synergy, blending live improvisation with high-energy beats.

ğŸ¥ In the video below, you can see some beautiful moments from this wedding: the venue, the setup, the guests â€” and also hear me warming up on tenor saxophone, playing delicate arpeggios in the chÃ¢teauâ€™s resonant acoustic, just before the celebration began.

It was a joy to be part of such a stunning day in an extraordinary location. I love what I do, and moments like this remind me why.

entry.content:
This past June, I had the pleasure of performing at an incredible wedding at Mas de Sant LleÃ­, a breathtaking venue located just outside Barcelona, surrounded by forest and with panoramic views of the Catalan countryside.

The day began in spectacular fashion â€” the couple made a grand entrance by helicopter, arriving from their ceremony held in a beautiful church in the heart of Barcelona city. From that moment on, the energy was pure magic.

During the wedding banquet, I performed as a surprise live saxophonist, making several appearances between courses. With my saxophone, I created vibrant musical moments â€” from elegant pop ballads to upbeat, festive tunes that had guests clapping, dancing, and celebrating around the tables.

The vibe was absolutely electric, a perfect mix of elegance and fun. This performance is the perfect example of how live saxophone music can transform a wedding meal into an unforgettable party.

ğŸ¥ In the video below, youâ€™ll see highlights from the day, scenes from the estate, and live audio captured while performing.

ğŸ“ Planning your wedding in Barcelona?

If you're looking to add live saxophone music to your wedding banquet, cocktail hour or party, Iâ€™d love to be part of your celebration.

As SAXONARA, I offer elegant performances, vibrant energy and a touch of style for couples who want their day to stand out.

entry.content:
This summer I had the chance to perform at a truly unique destination wedding in one of the newest and most charming venues near Barcelona: El AlcÃ¡zar del Garraf, just minutes from Sitges.

The venue has a stunning Mediterranean charm â€” white faÃ§ades, vintage touches, palm trees, and that timeless Sitges energy. A perfect blend of elegance and Ibiza-style atmosphere, ideal for couples planning a destination wedding in Spain or even a summer getaway (yes, the venue is also available for holidays).

ğŸ¥ In this VLOG, you can see the energy and flow of the wedding day from my perspective as a live saxophonist and entertainer.

EMBEDD

ğŸ· My Performance: From Elegant Banquet to Sunset Party

I began by surprising the guests during the wedding banquet, performing live saxophone between courses. The highlight? Leading the entire group to the party zone with my version of â€œJubelâ€ by Klingande â€” a classic that never fails to create magic.

Once everyone gathered by the pool, the party truly came alive. Together with the DJ, I performed live saxophone over a dynamic and uplifting set of electronic, disco and chill-house hits, including:

  • â€œDestination Calabriaâ€ â€“ Alex Gaudino

  • â€œSeptemberâ€ â€“ Earth, Wind & Fire
  • â€œNo Man No Cryâ€ â€“ Jimmy Sax
  • â€œInfinityâ€ â€“ Jaymes Young (SAXONARA remix)
  • â€œFreed from Desireâ€ â€“ Gala

The poolside vibe, the sunset light and the energy from the guests created an unforgettable Ibiza-style celebration â€” right in the heart of Catalonia.

ğŸ“ Are you planning a wedding in Barcelona, Sitges, Ibiza or Mallorca?

If youâ€™re looking for live music with saxophone, elegant but fun, that blends perfectly with your wedding aperitif, dinner or DJ party, Iâ€™d love to be part of your day.

Based in Barcelona, I perform regularly in Spain, Ibiza, Mallorca and France, and I specialize in destination weddings with international guests.
